mdRecord.dcterms:title: Vegova Street, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ple훾nik, Jo탑e (Slovene architect, 1872-1957) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The street runs along the old city wall. It used to be a ditch. Ple훾nik renewed a part of the preserved wall and turned it into an elevated park. Vegova Street is a part of the town planning of the so called town main road which leads from Ple훾nik's home behind the Trnovo church to the Southern square and was supposed to continue behind the transverse axis of the Zvezda Park. -- http://www.plecnik.net/index.php?mod=col&id=387&lan=en [work]
